about.name: Cannes
about.info_text: Cannes is a glamorous city on the French Riviera known for its beautiful beaches, luxurious resorts, and the world-famous Cannes Film Festival. With its stunning Mediterranean coastline, vibrant nightlife, and upscale shopping, Cannes is a playground for the rich and famous. Visitors can explore the historic old town, relax on sandy beaches, and enjoy exquisite dining and entertainment.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 75,000
Country: France
Time Zone: Central European Time (CET, UTC+1)
Language: French
Currency: Euro (EUR)

attractions_card.title: Promenade de la Croisette
attractions_card.description: Stroll along the iconic Promenade de la Croisette, a waterfront boulevard lined with palm trees and luxury hotels.

attractions_card.title: Cannes Film Festival
attractions_card.description: Experience the glitz and glamour of the Cannes Film Festival, where international cinema takes the spotlight.

attractions_card.title: Le Suquet (Old Town)
attractions_card.description: Explore Le Suquet, the charming old town of Cannes, with its cobbled streets, historic buildings, and panoramic views.

attractions_card.title: Île Saint-Honorat
attractions_card.description: Take a boat trip to Île Saint-Honorat, a tranquil island with a medieval monastery and natural beauty.

food_card.title: Bouillabaisse
food_card.description: Indulge in Bouillabaisse, a traditional Provençal fish stew, served in many of Cannes' seafood restaurants.

food_card.title: Socca
food_card.description: Try Socca, a savory chickpea flour pancake, often found in the markets of Cannes.

food_card.title: Salade Niçoise
food_card.description: Enjoy a classic Salade Niçoise, a salad featuring tuna, olives, anchovies, and fresh vegetables.

hotels_card.title: Hotel Barrière Le Majestic
hotels_card.description: Experience luxury at Hotel Barrière Le Majestic, a renowned 5-star hotel with stunning sea views.

hotels_card.title: InterContinental Carlton Cannes
hotels_card.description: Stay at the historic InterContinental Carlton Cannes, a grand hotel on the Croisette.

hotels_card.title: Hôtel Martinez
hotels_card.description: Relax at Hôtel Martinez, another prestigious 5-star hotel known for its elegance and comfort.

transport_card.title: Cannes Railway Station
transport_card.description: Arrive in Cannes via the Cannes Railway Station, providing connections to other cities along the French Riviera.

transport_card.title: Cannes Buses
transport_card.description: Use the Cannes bus network for convenient transportation within the city and its surrounding areas.
